import sys import math # Auto-generated code below aims at helping you parse # the standard input according to the problem statement. lista = [] n = int(input()) for i in range(n): pi = int(input()) lista.append(pi) menor = -1 for i in range(len(lista)): if menor == 0: break for j in range(len(lista)): if i == j: continue if i - j < menor or menor == -1: if i - j >= 0: menor = i - j # Write an action using print # To debug: print("Debug messages...", file=sys.stderr) print(menor)
